name: Social network
description: Web site still development, written in php, is a project of a social network. Drawable canvas and games are implemented on the website.

name: Online store
description: Online store website, is written using Angular.js.

name: Attendance page
description: Attendance page of the company's employees that calculates employee productivity. Master's degree work (thesis).

name: Blog
description: Internet blog, realized on Node.js and MongoDB. Final exam on MongoDB University.

name: Landing page
description: Landing page for labour company. It includes Responsive design, Cross browser layout, UX Design. Employed the jQuery library for visual effects, event handling, and document manipulation. Back-end for feedback form.
